admin_acls.LABEL: Admin IP ACL
admin_acls.PLACEHOLDER: Enter IPs or subnets in CIDR notation (e.g. /29) separated by new lines. As soon as you save, this will take effect, so make sure your IP is included!

integration_acls.LABEL: Integration IP ACL
integration_acls.PLACEHOLDER: Enter IPs or subnets in CIDR notation (e.g. /29) separated by new lines. As soon as you save, this will take effect!

session_duration.LABEL: Session Duration
session_duration.PLACEHOLDER: Default Session Duration, in minutes. Applies to clients and administrators. Sessions auto-renew while active. Set to 0 for no session expiration.

reload_on_wipe.LABEL: OS Reload on Wipe
reload_on_wipe.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the OS Profile Billing ID to be loaded on Server wipe, e.g. format-quick to clear disk partition tables or format-slow to fully zero all disks.

poll_granularity.LABEL: Bandwidth Poll Granularity
poll_granularity.PLACEHOLDER: Number of minutes between bandwidth polls. Smaller granularity (e.g. 1 minute) means more accuracy, but requires more storage space and slows down bandwidth graphs
